titles.title: Natural Gas Production Act of 2004
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the credit for producing fuel from a nonconventional source shall apply to gas produced onshore from a formation more than 15,000 feet deep.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/15/2004--Introduced. Natural Gas Production Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to qualify an onshore well from a formation more than 15,000 feet deep for the tax credit for producing fuel from a nonconventional source.
